website_summaries.verdict: A pretty stroller with a contemporary design and fun features.
pros: Jogger design is just like modern grown-up versions and is foldable for transport and storage
Has a bottom storage basket so youngsters can tote their dolls and extra accessories
cons: Assembly is difficult, and the instructions aren't very detailed

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad quality for the price, but nobody mentioned in reviews that the front wheel doesn't turn, so it's easy to move this stroller only forward, but kids are struggling every time they try to turn with it. Besides wheels are made of some cheap plastic, so if your kid try to use this stroller outside it will not last more than a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Very SHORT!
customer_reviews.text: This item says not for children less than 3 years old. So I purchased for my 8 year old. She has to lean over like a hunchback to reach the handlebar. It literally would be perfect size for a toddler/ 3 year old or so. Way too short/small for a little girl 6-8. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves pushing her dolls and stuffies
customer_reviews.text: With things like this, I like to wait a few months after purchase to review to ensure durability and an accurate review. This toy stroller was easy to assemble, I assembled it on Christmas Eve in a matter of a few minutes. This stroller is durable, it has stood up to at least three days a week use by my daughter and her friends since Christmas day. It looks nice and the materials, while not high quality, are definitely not low quality. My only complaint is that the front wheel doesn't turn. My daughter loves it still, and that is all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, we weren't able to use this stroller at all. It came with incorrect parts, so we couldn't even attach the wheels. It took about 5/10 minutes for us to even realize that some parts were missing because the directions were super vague, and didn't include a parts list.
customer_reviews.author: Markel Fennell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter is 18 months old and loves her stroller for her dolls. My only complaint is that the front wheel does not turn which means the child has to pick it up to be able to make turns which is my reason for giving it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie Wesolowski

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute. The only negative I can think of is that the front wheel doesn't turn its stationary. It's kind of odd but still works fine. I like that its has a storage basket underneath as well. It folds up if you need to store it just like a real stroller and its adorable. Seems pretty durable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Nice stroller for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old love the stroller. We have owned it for about 3 months and she walks her baby. It seems to hold up well and I like that it folds to make it easier to store. It is a little short at the handles but she is on the taller side. The wheels are hard foam so it is much quieter then the old plastic wheels of her old one. We love that! Front wheel does not turn.
customer_reviews.author: ltg337

customer_reviews.title: Putting stroller together.
customer_reviews.text: We've been trying to assemble one wheel for the past 45 min.... We finally were able to give our great grand baby her presents today Cruz she was away. Putting it together is a nightmare. The gasket on the back wheel won't stay on.. It keeps popping off. Our great granddaughter is very sad & its frustrating that we can't get it to stay together... 😪
customer_reviews.author: Nezzie!

customer_reviews.title: Adorable stroller!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stroller for my two year old daughter and she absolutely loves it, she pushes around her baby dolls every day! I think this stroller is well made, so far we haven’t had any issues with it. It wasn’t too difficult to put together, however I did get a little confused with the instructions, it took me maybe twenty minutes. I would definitely recommend this stroller!
customer_reviews.author: tbugs3

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Buy This Toy Jogger Stroller
customer_reviews.text: I am only giving the stroller a 2 stars because it was actually able to fit my daughters baby dolls and I was able to put together. The main problem is that the attachment pieces to hold the stroller together such as the wheels in particular keep falling off even minute. When I first assembled it I thought it would stay on but when my daughter who is 2.5 years old went to push the stroller the wheels came right off and so actually fell on the floor and hurt herself. I don't know if I just had a bad stroller or if they are all like that but I would recommend this toy jogger stroller because it isn't secure.
customer_reviews.author: Mika

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old daughter LOVED this gift for Christmas. It was her "big" Christmas gift (and for such a reasonable price!). She pushes her "babies" around in it every day. Very easy to be put together and stands up to 2 year old abuse like no other!
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loves It
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute, and my daughter LOVES it! I took one star away because our first one broke within a year—but it felt like more my kids fault than a defect, so we reordered a second to replace it without fuss. The price is great and she uses it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amamom

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for a low price. With a house of girls we have been through many doll strollers. This one is great and does not tip easily. Easy to build, seems durable, and great price. This is ideal for the toddler stage. Almost too short for my tiny 5 year old to really use, but works great for younger.
customer_reviews.author: ChOnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are pointless and very unclear. I feel like the wheels are going to fall off. But I give it one star for being cute. what I also don't like about it is that it's advertised on Amazon for 18 months - 5 years ..... However the instructions that come with it say that it's not intended children under 3 years old.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Doesn't take much to put the wheels ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Doesn't take much to put the wheels together, everything else was already ready to go. I bought this for my almost 2y old and she loves it!! sometimes she just wants to push it without a baby... i dont think this product is for any kid over 4.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchie

customer_reviews.title: A Christmas gift favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 2 year old who Loved it immediately. Requires assembly! End product is darling, sturdy and easily managed by our little. She had to try it out herself and sat in it several times with no worries.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Great gift And very well built
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy My 2 1⁄2 year-old granddaughter fell asleep in this doll stroller holding her doll..Pushes her babies around in it all the time. Pretty colors. Great value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Roni

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect for my 2 year old daughter. I wish the seat was deeper so the doll wouldn't slide out so easy and the front wheel doesn't swivel so turning is difficult but for a cheap toy it's perfect and exactly what kids want. Very happy with this purchase. Putting it together was easy enough but no thanks to the instructions which are not the easiest to understand. Overall though this stroller is great!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second time to buy this stroller my 5 year old daughter used it for years and we bought one for my 1 year old so they could both have one. They both love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good doll stroller
customer_reviews.text: I've had to put it back together a few times but that just may be my childrens fault. It's an amazing doll stroller folds up easily in a way that's easy to remember. Her dolls fit nicely small and the larger ones. And its tall enough for my 5 and 7yo to use comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her play jogging stroller. It resembles the one we have. It's sturdy and my toddler's son likes to try and sit on it. Hasn't broken yet!
customer_reviews.author: One big family

customer_reviews.title: Great for Toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3 year old (she’s on the tall end, more like a 4 year old) and it’s perfect sized for her and she loves this stroller! It held up nicely and she puts in her Baby Alive dolls with zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D. Monroy

customer_reviews.title: Great doll stroller!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller has been such a huge hit in our house! Used daily, been ridden by toddlers or all size and has been holding up wonderfully. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: D. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this product. Picture shows a child around 7-8 years old. Way to short! Hard to get wheels to stay on. Very unhappy with this item!
customer_reviews.author: Brandie Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Third stroller for kids and they are all a hit. Rolls easy, durable (as can be for a three year old) and washes clean with soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: LAinSFLA

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter has graduated from a stroller, so we got her this for Christmas. She pushes her babies around the house in it. She loves playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: P.G. Shriver

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old, lasted a month. The back wheels came off easily. The hem to the seating of the stroller somehow ripped. She never sat in it, only her doll.
customer_reviews.author: RF❤

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Got this stroller for my toddler for Christmas & I am beyond happy with my purchase! It’s adorable & sturdy! Easy to push! It doesn’t collapse when in use! Perfect size for my tall 2 year old & the best part... it folds up for easy storage! For the money I spent on this, I definitely wasn’t expecting it to be as great as it is! :)
customer_reviews.author: K. Gann

customer_reviews.title: Too Short for a 6yr old
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this for a child over 4 years old. It is extremely short. The description said this intended for kids up to 8, but I purchased if for my daughter turning 6 and she has to lean over to push it.
customer_reviews.author: Justisepapa2001

customer_reviews.title: Front wheel doesn't pivot but it doesn't stop our toddler!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is perfect for my 19-month old daughter, who loves to push around her teddies and dolls around. The instruction manual was a bit confusing because of the broken english, and the front wheel doesn't pivot, but the product itself is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Marie

customer_reviews.title: Little girl tough!
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for a friends daughters bday and she loves it. Its sturdy and has lasted over a year. Easy to clean as well!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The bar for the back wheels isn’t long enough. I’m unable to connect it properly so the stroller doesn’t roll. Making it useless. Disappointed. It looked so promising.
customer_reviews.author: josh miller

customer_reviews.title: Cute stroller but wheels don’t tutn
customer_reviews.text: The stroller is very cute. The only problem is the front wheel doesn’t turn so it is tricky for my 1 year old to maneuver it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Just like the real thing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just put wheels on and goooooo!!! That's it... Fun durable just like the real thing.. My grandaughter loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Good for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to assemble and so far seems like a quality product for the price. Our two year old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Ihlendorf

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller was a gift but the mom said it was 1 of the cutest strollers she'd ever seen. Hopefully it'll hold up to her daughter's rough and rugged strolling. :) It came quickly and was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: Normal cheap child’s toy
customer_reviews.text: My kid likes it, she sits in and it holds up. She cannot work the seat belt for the doll because it’s not a clip so she gets frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: luke hall

customer_reviews.title: Surprising quality
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality. Our 2 yr old loves pushing this thing around. Prefect height for her.

customer_reviews.title: my daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: we had a cheaper one that fell apart...this one is more sterdy.....hope it lasts her awhile..was easy to put together

customer_reviews.title: Durable

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Best toy stroller we have bought!! Super durable, my daughter loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Nice baby doll stroller
customer_reviews.text: A great baby doll stroller my daughter (1.5yo) loves it! Folds easily for storing
customer_reviews.author: Jill G.

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't have my daughter sit in it, but is perfect for her dolly and rolls easily.
customer_reviews.author: lynard69

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: like many other reviews, the front wheel was a bit tricky to get on, but my little niece sure did love it once it was all put together.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: its very cute
customer_reviews.text: We liked it, i just wish it was a little more sturdy. My granddaughter is 21 months and when she's pushing it, it falls back and makes her fall..it would be nice if it was a little heavier in the front so that wouldn't happen. thanks

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!

customer_reviews.title: Really cute.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and durable. I definitely would buy again. It arrived on time

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This is not for a 5 year old. Too small

customer_reviews.title: Awesome

customer_reviews.title: My niece loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, good quality, not so fun to assemble. Wish it could come foldable. 2 yr old loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: Axel rod was a little too long and had to file down wheel hub to make the end connector hold.

customer_reviews.title: Cute

customer_reviews.title: Cute folding stroller
customer_reviews.text: Love that it folds so we can take it with us places. Not amazing quality but for the price its great

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Good quality. my girls love pushing around their dolls. Some assembly required but only takes 5 min!

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Item
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why I got this in the mail today instead of the item described.

customer_reviews.title: Not big enough!

When the stroller arrived and my husband put it together it was more for a one yr old. We had to go out and purchase another stroller for her.

customer_reviews.title: A good value and quality stroller

customer_reviews.title: Great toy

customer_reviews.title: The parts don't fit!
customer_reviews.text: This instructions are so vague! The back axle isn't long enough to put the opposite wheel on with the washer to keep it on.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy stroller, I love that it folds in half easily for storage. It's very lightweight and a great size for small children. My daughter is on the tall side and almost 3, she loves this stroller.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Sturdy made and adorable! My daughter loves it and even sits in it and it holds up wonderfully! Worth the money!

customer_reviews.title: For toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to gift this to my daughter but it’s tiny. She’s 6 years old and this product is for someone half her age.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing

customer_reviews.title: This has held up great. My daughter is 2
customer_reviews.text: This has held up great. My daughter is 2.5 (but tall for her age) and this is the perfect size!

product_meta.title: Precious Toys Jogger Hot Pink Doll Stroller, Black Foam Handles and Hot Pink Frame - 0129A
product_meta.description: This "Precious Toys Doll Stroller" is with no doubt the best toy which can be given to our kids or as a gift. Our children will play for hours and use their imagination with this lovely "Doll Stroller". Not only for girls, but the boys will love it too with no exceptions! This "Precious Toys Doll Stroller" is constructed form high quality metal and fabric. It has a fold-able hood, seat belt, and basket in the bottom. It will also easily fold and unfold, so when is not in use, it will not take up space in your home. We chose the most loved colors on our customers, our children.
feature_bullets: High quality and durable FOLD-ABLE jogger doll stroller to carry up to 18
Hot pink & black stroller with fold-able hood, seat belt, and a large basket in the bottom
Wheels are solid and smooth, will NEVER leave any marks on a wooden floor
Super easy to fold and store. Very easy assembly all you need is to put on the wheels
Safety tested for lead free USA safety regulation

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars500 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
